charinfo.name: Inuzuka Kiba
charinfo.description: A Genin from Team 8, Kiba is a member of the Inuzuka clan, and is both short-tempered and impulsive. Using his dog, Akamaru, Kiba is capable of powerful taijutsu or fusing with Akamaru to become a deadly double headed dog.

abilities.name: Garouga
abilities.description: This skill does 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Double-Headed Wolf' this skill is improved and costs 1 less random chakra.

abilities.name: Double-Headed Wolf
abilities.description: Kiba and Akamaru turn into giant beasts attacking all enemies dealing 15 damage each turn for 3 turns. The following 3 turns 'Garouga' is improved and costs 1 less random chakra.* During this time Kiba gains 15 points of damage reduction.

abilities.name: Dynamic Marking
abilities.description: Akamaru sprays urine on one enemy who cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns. During this time, 'Double-Headed Wolf' and 'Garouga' will deal 5 additional damage to them. Dynamic Marking cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.

abilities.name: Smoke Bomb
abilities.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Kiba invulnerable for 1 turn.
